# 3rd Party Libraries

The following libraries are required to build the source:

* ML_Lib: Programmed by me, so it's included.
* OpenAL: Not sure, but probably: version 1.1
* Expat: Version 2.01
* Newton Game Dynamics: Not sure, but has: copyright 2000-2004
* libogg: version 1.1.3
* libvorbis: version 1.1.2
* zlib: version 1.2.3
